price: Ali, kad oni kakvu robu trgovačku ili zabavu ugledaju, pohrle joj i tebe ostave sama da stojiš. Reci: “Ono što je u Allaha bolje je i od zabave i od trgovine. A Allah je Opskrbitelj najbolji.”
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡاْ تِجَٰرَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا ٱنفَضُّوٓاْ إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ قَآئِمٗاۚ قُلۡ مَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ ٱلتِّجَٰرَةِۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-aw tijāratan aw lahwan infaḍḍū ilayhā watarakūka qāiman qul mā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun mina al-lahwi wamina al-tijārati wal-lahu khayru al-rāziqīna
